name: Ancient Booster Energy Capsule
rules: The Ancient Pokémon this card is attached to gets +60 HP, recovers from all Special Conditions, and can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

name: Awakening Drum
rules: Draw a card for each of your Ancient Pokémon in play.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Bianca's Devotion
rules: Heal all damage from 1 of your Pokémon that has 30 HP or less remaining.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Boxed Order
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 Item cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. Your turn ends.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Buddy
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon with 70 HP or less and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Ciphermaniac's Codebreaking
rules: Search your deck for 2 cards, shuffle your deck, then put those cards on top of it in any order.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Eri
rules: Your opponent reveals their hand, and you discard up to 2 Item cards you find there.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Explorer's Guidance
rules: Look at the top 6 cards of your deck and put 2 of them into your hand. Discard the other cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Full Metal Lab
rules: You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Future Booster Energy Capsule
rules: The Future Pokémon this card is attached to has no Retreat Cost, and the attacks it uses do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Hand Trimmer
rules: Each player discards cards from their hand until they have 5 cards in their hand. Your opponent discards first. (If a player has 5 or fewer cards in their hand, they do not discard.)
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Heavy Baton
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to has a Retreat Cost of exactly 4, is in the Active Spot, and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, move up to 3 Basic Energy cards from that Pokémon to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

name: Hero's Cape
rules: The Pokémon this card is attached to gets +100 HP.

name: Master Ball
rules: Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Maximum Belt
rules: Attacks used by the Pokémon this card is attached to do 50 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon ex (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Morty's Conviction
rules: You can use this card only if you discard another card from your hand.Draw a card for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Perilous Jungle
rules: During Pokémon Checkup, put 2 more damage counters on each Poisoned non-Darkness Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Prime Catcher
rules: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot. If you do, switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Reboot Pod
rules: Attach a Basic Energy card from your discard pile to each of your Future Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rescue Board
rules: The Retreat Cost of the Pokémon this card is attached to is Colorless less. If that Pokémon's remaining HP is 30 or less, it has no Retreat Cost.

name: Salvatore
rules: Search your deck for a card that has no Abilities and evolves from 1 of your Pokémon, and put it onto that Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck. You can use this card on a Pokémon you put down when you were setting up to play or on a Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Mist Energy
rules: As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides Colorless Energy.Prevent all effects of attacks used by your opponent's Pokémon done to the Pokémon this card is attached to. (Existing effects are not removed. Damage is not an effect.)

name: Neo Upper Energy
rules: As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides Colorless Energy.If this card is attached to a Stage 2 Pokémon, this card provides every type of Energy but provides only 2 Energy at a time.

attacks.text: This attack does 70 damage for each Special Energy card attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Raging Cannon
attacks.text: If all of your Benched Pokémon have at least 1 damage counter on them, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: Forest March
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Grass Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Jungle Hammer
attacks.text: Heal 50 damage from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Rapid Vernier
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may switch it with your Active Pokémon. If you do, you may move any amount of Energy from your other Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Prism Edge
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Hustle Play
abilities.text: Attacks used by this Pokémon cost Colorless less for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Blaze Blast
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Blaze Blitz
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Blaze Blitz again until it leaves the Active Spot.

abilities.name: Azure Seas
abilities.text: Damage from attacks used by this Pokémon isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Catharsis Roar
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: Tricolor Pump
attacks.text: Discard up to 3 Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each Energy card you discarded in this way. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Numbing Hold
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

abilities.name: Cobalt Command
abilities.text: Attacks used by your Future Pokémon, except any Iron Crown ex, do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Twin Shotels
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance, or by any effects on those Pokémon.

attacks.name: Repulsor Axe
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if it is Knocked Out), put 8 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Power Stomp
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Gnawing Curse
abilities.text: Whenever your opponent attaches an Energy card from their hand to 1 of their Pokémon, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tricky Steps
attacks.text: You may move an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon to 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Armor Tail
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Basic Pokémon ex.

attacks.name: Dirty Beam
attacks.text: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Steel Wing
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 50 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Cross Breaker
attacks.text: Discard up to 2 Metal Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Burst Roar
attacks.text: Discard your hand and draw 6 cards.

attacks.name: Bellowing Thunder
attacks.text: You may discard any amount of Basic Energy from your Pokémon. This attack does 70 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

name: Bianca's Devotion
rules: Heal all damage from 1 of your Pokémon that has 30 HP or less remaining.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Ciphermaniac's Codebreaking
rules: Search your deck for 2 cards, shuffle your deck, then put those cards on top of it in any order.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Eri
rules: Your opponent reveals their hand, and you discard up to 2 Item cards you find there.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Explorer's Guidance
rules: Look at the top 6 cards of your deck and put 2 of them into your hand. Discard the other cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Morty's Conviction
rules: You can use this card only if you discard another card from your hand.Draw a card for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Salvatore
rules: Search your deck for a card that has no Abilities and evolves from 1 of your Pokémon, and put it onto that Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck. You can use this card on a Pokémon you put down when you were setting up to play or on a Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.
